buildup.text: Informed consent means the person being influenced has access to all relevant information before deciding.

discovery.text: Ethical influence provides transparency about intentions, costs, and alternatives.

climax.text: The most trustworthy negotiators share information that helps the other side make a fully informed choice.

quiz.question: What does ethical influence require?
options: Hiding information to protect the deal
Giving the other side access to all relevant information
Only sharing information that supports your position
